title: Dataproc - 2.2.x release versions
abstract:
# Dataproc - 2.2.x release versions
| Component        | 2.2.9-debian12/-ubuntu22/-rocky9 2024/03/14 | 2.2.8-debian12/-ubuntu22/-rocky9 2024/03/06 | 2.2.7-debian12/-ubuntu22/-rocky9 2024/02/28 | 2.2.6-debian12/-ubuntu22/-rocky9 2024/02/08 | 2.2.5-debian12/-ubuntu22/-rocky9 2024/02/01 |
|:-----------------------------------------|:----------------------------------------------|:----------------------------------------------|:----------------------------------------------|:----------------------------------------------|:----------------------------------------------|
| Apache Atlas initialization action  | 2.2.0           | 2.2.0           | 2.2.0           | 2.2.0           | 2.2.0           |
| Apache Flink optional component   | 1.17.0          | 1.17.0          | 1.17.0          | 1.17.0          | 1.17.0          |
| Apache Hadoop installed     | 3.3.6           | 3.3.6           | 3.3.6           | 3.3.6           | 3.3.6           |

| Apache Hive WebHCat optional component | 3.1.3           | 3.1.3           | 3.1.3           | 3.1.3           | 3.1.3           |
| Apache Kafka initialization action  | 3.1.0           | 3.1.0           | 3.1.0           | 3.1.0           | 3.1.0           |
| Apache Pig installed      | 0.18.0-SNAPSHOT        | 0.18.0-SNAPSHOT        | 0.18.0-SNAPSHOT        | 0.18.0-SNAPSHOT        | 0.18.0-SNAPSHOT        |
| Apache Spark installed     | 3.5.0           | 3.5.0           | 3.5.0           | 3.5.0           | 3.5.0           |

| Apache Tez installed      | 0.10.2          | 0.10.2          | 0.10.2          | 0.10.2          | 0.10.2          |
| BigQuery Connector initialization action | 0.34.0          | 0.34.0          | 0.34.0          | 0.34.0          | 0.34.0          |
| Cloud Storage Connector installed  | 3.0.0           | 3.0.0           | 3.0.0           | 3.0.0           | 3.0.0           |
| Conscrypt installed      | 2.5.2           | 2.5.2           | 2.5.2           | 2.5.2           | 2.5.2           |
| Docker optional component    | 24.0           | 24.0           | 24.0           | 24.0           | 24.0           |
| Hue initialization action    | 4.11.0          | 4.11.0          | 4.11.0          | 4.11.0          | 4.11.0          |
| Java installed       | 11           | 11           | 11           | 11           | 11           |
| JupyterLab Notebook optional component | 3.6           | 3.6           | 3.6           | 3.6           | 3.6           |
| Oozie initialization action    | 5.2.1           | 5.2.1           | 5.2.1           | 5.2.1           | 5.2.1           |
| Python installed       | Python 3.11         | Python 3.11         | Python 3.11         | Python 3.11         | Python 3.11         |
| R installed        | R 4.2           | R 4.2           | R 4.2           | R 4.2           | R 4.2           |
| Ranger optional component    | 2.4.0           | 2.4.0           | 2.4.0           | 2.4.0           | 2.4.0           |
| Scala installed       | 2.12.18          | 2.12.18          | 2.12.18          | 2.12.18          | 2.12.18          |
| Solr optional component     | 9.2.1           | 9.2.1           | 9.2.1           | 9.2.1           | 9.2.1           |
| Trino optional component     | 432           | 432           | 432           | 432           | 432           |
| Zeppelin Notebook optional component  | 0.10.1          | 0.10.1          | 0.10.1          | 0.10.1          | 0.10.1          |
| Zookeeper optional component    | 3.8.3           | 3.8.3           | 3.8.3           | 3.8.1           | 3.8.1           |
**Known 2.2 image version issues and limitations:**
- The **Hue** component is not functional.
- [Data Lineage](/dataproc/docs/guides/lineage) is not available since Spark 3.5 does not support lineage data collection.
- [Legacy agents](/monitoring/api/metrics_agent) are not installed in 2.2 image version clusters. [monitoring-agent-defaults](/dataproc/docs/guides/dataproc-metrics#monitoring_agent_metrics) are not available unless the [Ops Agent](/stackdriver/docs/solutions/agents/ops-agent) is installed. Note: OSS metrics and logging are available for [Dataproc components](/dataproc/docs/concepts/components/overview#available_optional_components) .- Logging or monitoring for third-party applications are not available unless the [Ops Agent](/stackdriver/docs/solutions/agents/ops-agent) is installed.**Notes:**
- The source code to image 2.2 libraries that are licensed under Reciprocal and Restricted licenses is available at the`/usr/local/share/google/dataproc/third-party-sources`path on Dataproc cluster VMs
